name.title: Name
name.description: Plugin name as displayed in the Homebridge log

host.title: HikVision NVR/DVR Host Address
host.description: This is the name / ip address for your HikVision NVR/DVR.

port.title: HikVision NVR/DVR Host port
port.description: This is the port for your HikVision NVR/DVR. Typically 80 or 443

secure.title: HikVision NVR/DVR SSL Connection
secure.description: This enables SSL support for the HikVision NVR/DVR connection

ignoreInsecureTls.title: Enable self signed SSL certificates
ignoreInsecureTls.description: This enables usage of self signed SSL certificates for the HikVision NVR/DVR connection.

username.title: Username
username.description: This is the username for your HikVision NVR/DVR.

password.title: Password
password.description: This is the Password for your HikVision NVR/DVR.

debugFfmpeg.title: Enable Debug for FFMPEG
debugFfmpeg.description: Enable Debug logging for FFMPEG connection. Very noisy in the log file.

refresh.title: Refresh interval of cameras from NVR/DVR
refresh.description: Number of hours between refreshes of the camera list from the NVR/DVR. Default is 12 hours. Minimum is 1 hour.

test.title: Development / Test flag
test.description: Set on to enable test mode. This will prevent 'Service name "xxxxx" is already in use on the network' messages.

debug.title: Enable debug logging
debug.description: Enable debug logging for the plugin. Very noisy in the log file.

maxWidth.title: Override maximum width
maxWidth.description: Override the supplied video width from the NVR/DVR. This is used to set the maximum width used for video streamed to HomeKit. Set to 0 to disable.

maxHeight.title: Override maximum height
maxHeight.description: Override the supplied video height from the NVR/DVR. This is used to set the maximum height used for video streamed to HomeKit. Set to 0 to disable.

items.title: Camera Name
items.description: Name of the camera you want to enable as a doorbell. Creates a switch to be used with an automation to trigger the doorbell.
